personalInfo.clubAffl: Pohlcat GC (Mt. Pleasant, Michigan); Lochenheath GC (Traverse City, Michigan)

tourBios.exmtStatus: Finished T5 at 2015 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.carHigh: 2015: Played in 11 events on the Mackenzie Tour. After an opening-round 72 at The Great Waterway Classic, rebounded with rounds of 66-66-65 to finish T2...He added another top-five finish at the Cape Breton Celtic Classic, where he carded four consecutive rounds in the 60s to finish T4...Concluded the season with a T8 at the Freedom 55 Financial Championship, giving him six top-25 finishes overall
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Named the 2004 Michigan High School Mr. Golf...Attended Michigan State University where he helped lead the Spartans to three BigTen Championships (2004, 2006 and 2007)...Was named BigTen Freshman of the Year in 2004...Won five individual NCAA tournament titles over four years...Was Honorable Mention All-American in 2008...Currently the Career Scoring Average leader at MSU.
tourBios.personal: Sister, Natalie, is a former Women's Michigan State Amateur champion...Enjoys hunting and boating in Northern Michigan...After college served as an Assistant Coach at Michigan State, followed by a stint as the Interim Head Coach for the Spartans...If he had an entrance song at the first tee, it would be Regulate by Nate Dogg & Warren G.

tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Started slowly with four missed cuts in his first seven events but found his stride with three top 10s in last four events. After opening with an even-par 72, closed with rounds of 66-66-65 at The Great Waterway Classic for a T2 and his best career Mackenzie Tour finish...Posted a T4 at the Cape Breton Open with four rounds in the 60s...Capped off his season with a final-round 63 at the Freedom 55 Financial Championship to claim 25th on the Order of Merit.



2014: Finished solo second at PGA TOUR Canada Qualifying School outside Orlando to earn exempt status...After a first-round 74, rebounded with rounds of 64-66-64 to finish seventh at the ATB Financial Classic for first top-10 finish of season...One week later, posted weekend rounds of 70-67 to T5 at the Forces and Families Open...Added a T8 finish at the season-ending Freedom 55 Financial Championship to conclude the season 24th on the Order of Merit.
tourBios.personal: Lists his family as his biggest golf influence since they taught him what he knows...Favorite golfer is Retief Goosen...Favorite team is the Detroit Pistons...Sister, Natalie, is a former Women's Michigan State Amateur champion...Enjoys hunting and boating in Northern Michigan...After college served as an Assistant Coach at Michigan State, followed by a stint as the Interim Head Coach for the Spartans...If he had an entrance song at the first tee, it would be "Regulate" by Nate Dogg & Warren G.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was T2nd in 2015 at the The Great Waterway Classic.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 21st in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
